languages.text: {n}Насупившиеся брови офицера еще сильнее съезжаются в кучу. Он говорит медленно, тщательно подбирая слова.{/n} "Не должны ни в коем разе, Лорд-капитан. Техноматы проведут инспекцию оборудования сейчас же. С ответственными я также разберусь незамедлительно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Насупившиеся брови офицера еще сильнее съезжаются в кучу. Он говорит медленно, тщательно подбирая слова.{/n} "Не должны ни в коем разе, Лорд-капитан. Техноматы проведут инспекцию оборудования сейчас же. С ответственными на нижних палубах я также разберусь незамедлительно".

languages.text: {n}The officer's furrowed eyebrows draw even closer together. He speaks slowly, carefully picking his words:{/n} "I most definitely can, Lord Cap'n. The technomats will inspect the equipment immediately. I will also deal with those in charge without delay."
languages.original_text: {n}Насупившиеся брови офицера еще сильнее съезжаются в кучу. Он говорит медленно, тщательно подбирая слова.{/n} "Не должны ни в коем разе, Лорд-капитан. Техноматы проведут инспекцию оборудования сейчас же. С ответственными я также разберусь незамедлительно".

traits.locale_text: {n}The officer's furrowed eyebrows draw even closer together. He speaks slowly, carefully picking his words.{/n} "You most definitely should not, Lord Captain. The technomats will inspect the equipment immediately. I will also deal with the people in charge on the lower decks without delay."

{n}The officer's furrowed eyebrows draw even closer together. He speaks slowly, carefully picking his words.{/n} "You most definitely should not, Lord Captain. The technomats will inspect the equipment immediately. I will also deal with the people in charge on the lower decks without delay."

{n}The officer's furrowed eyebrows draw even closer together. He speaks slowly, carefully picking his words.{/n} "You most definitely should not, Lord Cap'n. The technomats will inspect the equipment immediately. I will also deal with those in charge on the lower decks without delay."

{n}The officer's furrowed eyebrows draw even closer together. He speaks slowly, carefully picking his words.{/n} "You most definitely should not, Lord Cap'n. The technomats will inspect the equipment immediately. I will also deal with those in charge on the lower decks without delay."

{n}The officer's furrowed eyebrows draw even closer together. He speaks slowly, carefully picking his words:{/n} "I most definitely can, Lord Cap'n. The technomats will inspect the equipment immediately. I will also deal with those in charge on the lower decks without delay."

{n}The officer's furrowed eyebrows draw even closer together. He speaks slowly, carefully picking his words:{/n} "I most definitely can, Lord Cap'n. The technomats will inspect the equipment immediately. I will also deal with those in charge on the lower decks without delay."

languages.text: {n}Die Augenbrauen des Offiziers ziehen sich noch weiter zusammen. Er spricht langsam und wählt seine Worte mit Bedacht.{/n} "Das kann ich ganz gewiss, Lord Cap'n. Die Technomaten werden die Gerätschaften umgehend inspizieren. Und ich werde mich sofort um die Verantwortlichen kümmern."
languages.original_text: {n}The officer's furrowed eyebrows draw even closer together. He speaks slowly, carefully picking his words:{/n} "I most definitely can, Lord Cap'n. The technomats will inspect the equipment immediately. I will also deal with those in charge without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Augenbrauen des Offiziers ziehen sich noch mehr zusammen. Er spricht langsam und wählt seine Worte mit Bedacht.{/n} "Das solltet Ihr definitiv nicht, Lord Cap'n. Die Technomaten werden die Gerätschaften umgehend inspizieren. Und ich werde mich ohne Verzögerung um die Verantwortlichen auf den unteren Decks kümmern."

languages.text: {n}Les sourcils froncés de l'officier se rapprochent encore un peu plus. Il s'exprime lentement, en choisissant ses mots avec le plus grand soin :{/n} « Certainement pas, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Les technomates vont immédiatement inspecter le matériel. Je vais aussi m'occuper sur-le-champ des responsables. »
languages.original_text: {n}The officer's furrowed eyebrows draw even closer together. He speaks slowly, carefully picking his words:{/n} "I most definitely can, Lord Cap'n. The technomats will inspect the equipment immediately. I will also deal with those in charge without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les sourcils froncés de l'officier se rapprochent encore un peu plus. Il s'exprime lentement, en choisissant ses mots avec le plus grand soin.{/n} « Absolument pas, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Les technomates vont immédiatement inspecter le matériel. Je vais aussi m'occuper sur-le-champ des responsables sur les ponts inférieurs. »

languages.text: {n}雷沃的眉头皱得更紧了。他的语速很慢，小心翼翼地斟酌着用词。{/n}“您绝对不需要这么做，船长老大。我会让技工立刻检查设备，也会立刻处理相关负责人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The officer's furrowed eyebrows draw even closer together. He speaks slowly, carefully picking his words:{/n} "I most definitely can, Lord Cap'n. The technomats will inspect the equipment immediately. I will also deal with those in charge without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}雷沃的眉头皱得更近了。他的语速很慢，小心翼翼地斟酌着用词。{/n}“您绝对不需要这么做，船长老大。我会让技工立刻检查设备，也会立刻处理底层甲板的负责人。”

languages.text: {n}士官の眉間のしわがさらに深くなる。彼はゆっくりと、慎重に言葉を選んで話し始めた。{/n}「もちろん遂行可能です、ロード・キャプテン。テクノマットにすぐ装置を調べさせます。担当連中にも即刻対応するよう言っておきます」
languages.original_text: {n}The officer's furrowed eyebrows draw even closer together. He speaks slowly, carefully picking his words:{/n} "I most definitely can, Lord Cap'n. The technomats will inspect the equipment immediately. I will also deal with those in charge without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}士官の眉間のしわがさらに深くなる。彼はゆっくりと、慎重に言葉を選んで話し始めた。{/n}「全くその必要はありません、ロード・キャプテン。テクノマットにすぐ装置を調べさせます。下の甲板の担当連中にもすぐに対応するよう言っておきます」

languages.text: {n}El ceño fruncido del oficial se arruga todavía más y comienza a hablar lento, midiendo cuidadosamente sus palabras.{/n} «No tiene que hacerlo, Lord Capitán. Ordenaré a los tecnómatas que inspeccionen el equipo de inmediato. También hablaré con los encargados cuanto antes».
languages.original_text: {n}The officer's furrowed eyebrows draw even closer together. He speaks slowly, carefully picking his words:{/n} "I most definitely can, Lord Cap'n. The technomats will inspect the equipment immediately. I will also deal with those in charge without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}El ceño fruncido del oficial se arruga todavía más y comienza a hablar lento, midiendo cuidadosamente sus palabras.{/n} «Desde luego que no, Capi. Ordenaré a los tecnómatas que inspeccionen el equipo de inmediato. También hablaré con los encargados de las cubiertas inferiores cuanto antes».

languages.text: {n}Subayın zaten çatık olan kaşları daha da çatılıyor. Sözlerini dikkatle seçerek, tane tane konuşuyor.{/n} "Elbette hayır Lord Kaptan. Teknomatlar, teçhizatı derhâl inceleyecek. Ayrıca tez elden sorumlularla ilgileneceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}The officer's furrowed eyebrows draw even closer together. He speaks slowly, carefully picking his words:{/n} "I most definitely can, Lord Cap'n. The technomats will inspect the equipment immediately. I will also deal with those in charge without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}Subayın zaten çatık olan kaşları daha da çatılıyor. Sözlerini dikkatle seçerek, tane tane konuşuyor.{/n} "Elbette hayır Lord Kaptan. Teknomatlar, teçhizatı derhâl inceleyecek. Ayrıca tez elden sorumlularla ilgileneceğim."
